meanings.definition: Women who live in the same country as oneself.
meanings.sent1: My countrywomen are friendly neighbors who share our traditions.
meanings.sent2: I feel a sense of unity and belonging when I gather with my countrywomen.
meanings.sent3: The countrywomen organized a potluck to celebrate our national holiday.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, countrywomen come together like a shield of support.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of countrywomen echoes through the village, creating a warm atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Women who are from the same country as oneself.
meanings.sent1: My countrywomen proudly represent our nation in international events.
meanings.sent2: When abroad, I feel a connection with other countrywomen from back home.
meanings.sent3: The countrywomen at the embassy event shared stories of their homeland.
meanings.sent4: The bond between countrywomen is as strong as the roots of a tree.
meanings.sent5: The resilience of countrywomen shines brightly during challenging times.
